title: Templating functions for
text: goal btt22 help build ussie package Building Tidy Tools 2022 workshop. central project course student build package called {ussie}, populate functions. two big purposes package: install package, packages need course. btt_state(): list available states. state identifier like "2.1.1": day 2, session 1, task 1. identifier corresponds branch {ussie} repository. gets skeleton code used given state puts package’s R folder tests/testthat folder. title: btt22 0.0.9
text: Update ussie templates, given benefit practice. (#30)

title: btt22 0.0.8
text: Update treatment dplyr::all_of(). (#28)

title: btt22 0.0.7
text: Add packages imports, installed automatically. (#25)

title: btt22 0.0.6
text: Remove base pipe folks R v3 can still use. Generates startup message case base pipe available. (#24)

title: btt22 0.0.5
text: Various updates ussie repo.

title: btt22 0.0.2
text: Added {palmerpenguins}. (#22) Improved user-interface btt_get(). (#17) Lists files copied package directory. Opens files interactive editing (use open argument change). Uses updated structure template files {ussie}; old version {btt22} work new version {ussie}.

title: btt22 0.0.1
text: Updated reflect new home rstudio-conf-2022. Removed vignettes, can handle everything README. (#1, #4) package keeps copy {ussie} repo. (#11) Added option "btt22.source" use "local" (default) "remote" source {ussie}. puts latest copy ussie repo, .zip file, /inst/ussie-repo/ bumps (patch) version package Imports {devtools}, {diffviewer}, {dplyr}, {engsoccerdata}, {ggplot2}, {shiny}, installing package get packages need course. (#15) Renamed btt_reset() btt_reset_hard(). (#12) Added function get new files state ussie, btt_get(). (#7) Must run directory within R package called ussie. Added function reset state ussie, btt_reset(). (#5) Must run directory within R package called ussie. R directory tests directory Imports Suggests fields DESCRIPTION file Automatic loading unloading ussie repo. (#3) Added .onLoad(), .unLoad() functions ussie repo placed temporary directory. Currently, package downloads ussie repo GitHub time loads; ussie branches stable, can include ussie.tar.gz inst folder package. Added internal function path_repo(), returns (temporary) path ussie repo user’s temp directory. Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
